project.name: V3 Biomedical - SEO
project.description: SEO optimization for V3 Biomedical, a wound care EMR software company. This is a greenfield SEO opportunity - the domain has DR 24 authority but zero organic visibility. Focus on content creation, technical SEO foundation, and broken backlink reclamation.

metadata.key_insight: DR 24 with 0 traffic means content is the critical bottleneck. The domain has link equity but needs content to rank.

epics.description:
Establish technical SEO foundation for crawlability and indexation. Currently the site may have issues with sitemap, robots.txt, and basic on-page elements.

**Business Impact:** CRITICAL - Without proper technical foundation, content cannot rank.

**Blockers:** May need GSC access verification.

stories.description:
Ensure XML sitemap exists at /sitemap.xml and is properly configured.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Sitemap exists and is accessible
- All public pages included
- Sitemap submitted to Google Search Console

tasks.description:
Navigate to https://v3biomedical.com/sitemap.xml

If exists:
- Document number of URLs
- Check last modified date
- Verify all pages included

If not exists:
- Document this as blocker
- Determine how to generate (CMS feature, plugin, or manual)

tasks.summary: Submit sitemap to Google Search Console
tasks.description:
In GSC:
1. Navigate to Sitemaps section
2. Add sitemap URL
3. Submit
4. Monitor for errors

**Note:** Requires verified GSC access. If not set up, this is a blocker.

stories.description:
Verify robots.txt allows proper crawling and references sitemap.

**Recommended robots.txt:**
```
User-agent: *
Allow: /

Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /private/

Sitemap: https://v3biomedical.com/sitemap.xml
```

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- robots.txt accessible
- Not blocking important pages
- Sitemap reference included

tasks.description:
Check https://v3biomedical.com/robots.txt

Document:
- Current rules
- Any blocked paths
- Sitemap reference (if any)
- Potential issues

If modifications needed, update to include:
- Allow: / for main crawler
- Disallow admin/private areas
- Sitemap reference

Test with Google's robots.txt tester in GSC.

stories.summary: Optimize homepage and existing page title tags
stories.description:
Update title tags to include primary keywords.

**Title Tag Changes:**
| Page | Current | Optimized |
|------|---------|----------|
| Homepage | V3 Biomedical | Wound Care EMR Software | V3 Biomedical |
| Products | [Verify] | Wound Care Software Solutions | V3 Biomedical |
| About | [Verify] | About V3 Biomedical | Wound Care Technology |
| Contact | [Verify] | Contact V3 Biomedical | Request a Demo |

tasks.description:
Run Screaming Frog or manually check all pages:
- Document current title tags
- Note character counts
- Identify keyword opportunities

Change from 'V3 Biomedical' to 'Wound Care EMR Software | V3 Biomedical'

Target keyword: wound care emr software (90 searches/mo)

tasks.summary: Update all other page title tags
tasks.description:
Update remaining pages:
- Products: 'Wound Care Software Solutions | V3 Biomedical'
- About: 'About V3 Biomedical | Wound Care Technology'
- Contact: 'Contact V3 Biomedical | Request a Demo'

stories.summary: Add meta descriptions to all pages
stories.description:
Currently pages may be missing meta descriptions. Add keyword-rich descriptions to all pages.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All pages have meta descriptions
- Each 150-160 characters
- Include primary keyword and CTA

tasks.description:
Add meta descriptions:

**Homepage:**
'V3 Biomedical provides advanced wound care EMR software for healthcare providers. Streamline wound assessment, documentation, and telehealth. Request a demo.'

**Products:**
'Comprehensive wound care EMR software with documentation tools, telehealth capabilities, and EMR integration. Designed for wound care specialists.'

**Resources:**
'Expert wound care resources including documentation guides, assessment tools, and best practices for healthcare providers.'

epics.description:
Implement structured data for Organization and SoftwareApplication to establish entity and improve search visibility.

**Business Impact:** MEDIUM - Establishes brand entity with Google and enables rich snippets for software product.

stories.description:
Add Organization schema to establish brand entity with Google.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Schema validates in Rich Results Test
- Includes logo, contact, and sameAs links
- Applied to homepage

tasks.description:
Collect:
- Official company name: V3 Biomedical
- Logo URL
- Website URL
- Contact email
- LinkedIn company page URL
- Crunchbase profile URL (already exists - DR 90 link)
- Description

Add to homepage <head>:

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "Organization",
  "name": "V3 Biomedical",
  "url": "https://v3biomedical.com",
  "logo": "https://v3biomedical.com/logo.png",
  "description": "Wound care EMR software and healthcare technology solutions",
  "sameAs": [
    "https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/v3-biomedical",
    "https://www.linkedin.com/company/v3biomedical"
  ],
  "contactPoint": {
    "@type": "ContactPoint",
    "contactType": "sales",
    "email": "contact@v3biomedical.com"
  }
}
```

Validate at https://search.google.com/test/rich-results
Fix any errors. Screenshot results.

stories.summary: Implement SoftwareApplication schema on product pages
stories.description:
Add SoftwareApplication schema to product pages to describe the software product.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Schema validates
- Applied to all product/software pages
- Includes proper applicationCategory

tasks.description:
Add to product pages:

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "SoftwareApplication",
  "name": "V3 Biomedical Wound Care EMR",
  "applicationCategory": "HealthApplication",
  "operatingSystem": "Web-based",
  "offers": {
    "@type": "Offer",
    "price": "0",
    "priceCurrency": "USD",
    "availability": "https://schema.org/ContactForPrice"
  },
  "description": "Wound care EMR software for healthcare providers"
}
```

epics.description:
Create new pages targeting high-value keywords. This is the MOST CRITICAL epic - without content, the site cannot rank despite having DR 24 authority.

**Target Keywords:**
- wound care emr (90/mo) - Commercial intent
- wound care software (170/mo) - Commercial intent
- wound care documentation (110/mo) - Informational intent

**Business Impact:** HIGHEST - Content is the only bottleneck preventing organic traffic.

stories.summary: Create Wound Care EMR Software product page
stories.description:
Create comprehensive product page at /products/wound-care-emr/ targeting 'wound care emr software' (90 searches/mo).

**Page Requirements:**
- Word count: 2,000+
- Primary keyword: wound care emr software
- Include: Features, benefits, integrations, demo CTA
- FAQ section for schema
- Internal links to resources

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Page published at /products/wound-care-emr/
- 2,000+ words
- All content requirements met
- Schema implemented

tasks.description:
Analyze top-ranking pages for 'wound care emr software':

Competitors to analyze:
- WoundRounds
- Net Health
- Tissue Analytics
- Swift Medical

Document:
- Word counts
- H2/H3 structure
- Key features highlighted
- CTAs used
- FAQs included

Create detailed outline:

**H1:** Wound Care EMR Software | V3 Biomedical

**Sections:**
1. Introduction (what is wound care EMR software)
2. Key Features
   - Wound documentation
   - Wound measurement/imaging
   - Treatment tracking
   - Reporting/analytics
3. Benefits for Healthcare Providers
4. Integrations
5. Use Cases
6. FAQ (5+ questions)
7. Demo CTA

tasks.summary: Write Wound Care EMR product page content
tasks.description:
Write 2,000+ word product page following outline.

**SEO Requirements:**
- Primary keyword in H1, first paragraph, H2s
- Secondary keywords: wound care software, wound emr, wound documentation
- Include keyword variations naturally
- Compelling meta description
- Alt text for any images

Publish at /products/wound-care-emr/

Implement:
- SoftwareApplication schema
- FAQ schema (if FAQs included)
- Add to navigation
- Add to sitemap
- Create internal links from homepage

stories.description:
Create comprehensive resource at /resources/wound-care-documentation/ targeting 'wound care documentation' (110 searches/mo).

**Page Requirements:**
- Word count: 2,500+
- Primary keyword: wound care documentation
- Include: Best practices, compliance info, templates, checklists
- Educational/informational intent

**Note:** This page will also be the redirect target for the broken backlink.

tasks.description:
Research:
- Regulatory requirements (CMS, Joint Commission)
- Best practices for wound documentation
- Common documentation errors
- Required elements in wound assessments
- Compliance considerations

Outline for 2,500+ word guide:

**H1:** Wound Care Documentation: Complete Guide for Healthcare Providers

**Sections:**
1. Introduction to wound care documentation
2. Why proper documentation matters
3. Required elements in wound documentation
4. Wound assessment documentation
5. Treatment documentation
6. Compliance requirements
7. Common documentation errors to avoid
8. Documentation templates/checklists
9. Technology solutions
10. FAQ

Write 2,500+ word educational guide.

**Content Requirements:**
- Comprehensive coverage of topic
- Actionable best practices
- Compliance information
- Link to product page where relevant (soft sell)
- Downloadable checklist/template if possible

Publish at /resources/wound-care-documentation/

Implement:
- FAQ schema
- Add to resources section
- Internal link from homepage
- Internal link from product page

epics.description:
Reclaim link equity from broken backlink pointing to deleted blog post.

**Broken Link Details:**
- Source: westhollywoodweekly.com (DR 31)
- Target: /post/understanding-patient-centered-care-in-wound-care
- Anchor: 'patient-centric wound care'
- Status: 404

**Business Impact:** MEDIUM - Healthcare-relevant link with good anchor text from DR 31 site.

stories.summary: Implement redirect for broken backlink URL
stories.description:
Create 301 redirect from broken URL to relevant existing page (wound care documentation guide once created).

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Redirect implemented and tested
- Returns 301 status code
- Redirects to relevant content page

tasks.description:
Add redirect rule:

**Apache (.htaccess):**
```apache
Redirect 301 /post/understanding-patient-centered-care-in-wound-care /resources/wound-care-documentation/
```

**Nginx:**
```nginx
location = /post/understanding-patient-centered-care-in-wound-care {
    return 301 /resources/wound-care-documentation/;
}
```

**Note:** Wait until /resources/wound-care-documentation/ is published before implementing.

Test redirect:

```bash
curl -I https://v3biomedical.com/post/understanding-patient-centered-care-in-wound-care
```

Verify:
- HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently
- Location header points to /resources/wound-care-documentation/

After 2-4 weeks, check Ahrefs backlinks report:
- Verify backlink from westhollywoodweekly.com shows as live
- Document status change
